title: Mobile-Based Short-Intensive Leadership Development Program

context.additional_context: Content design optimized for smartphone-based learning environments, aimed at strengthening practical application capabilities of current professionals

learning_goals: Learners can identify situational leadership style applications with over 85% accuracy.
Learners can implement team member motivation strategies during decision-making through at least three simulation evaluations.
Learners can propose effective problem-solving solutions for at least 8 out of 10 practical scenarios provided on a mobile platform.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
